table.name: vtiger_costoffice
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_costoffice` ( `costofficeid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `year` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `month` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `cost` DECIMAL(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `office` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`costofficeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_costofficecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_costofficecf` ( `vtiger_costofficecf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_costofficecf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
